get.summary: Fetch transaction details by hash

parameters.description: The deadline (as a Unix timestamp) for the permit.

info.title: Histori Multichain Data API
info.description:
Welcome to the Histori Multichain Data API! Our API provides seamless access to a comprehensive range of token data, multichain transaction histories, decoded event logs, and detailed on-chain analytics across multiple blockchain networks. 

With Histori, developers can build robust crypto applications such as wallet activity feeds, tax and accounting tools, DAO analytics, and Web3 financial services with enterprise-grade data. 

This API is designed to serve projects of any scale, from independent developers to large teams, enabling high-quality, consistent access to multichain on-chain data in a single platform.

log_index.description: The index of the log event within the transaction.

raw_log_topics.description: The list of topics (event signatures) in the log event.

sender_address.description: The address of the contract that emitted the log event.

raw_log_data.description: The raw data contained in the log event.

block_signed_at.description: The ISO timestamp when the block was signed.

block_hash.description: The hash of the block that contains the transaction.

tx_hash.description: The transaction hash (unique identifier for the transaction).

tx_index.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

successful.description: Indicates whether the transaction was successful (true/false).

from.description: The address that initiated the transaction.

miner.description: The address of the miner who mined the block (optional field).

to.description: The recipient address of the transaction. It can be null for contract creation transactions.

value.description: The value transferred in the transaction, denominated in Ether.

gas_offered.description: The amount of gas offered by the sender for the transaction.

gas_spent.description: The amount of gas actually spent in the transaction.

gas_price.description: The price of gas for the transaction, denominated in gwei.

fees_paid.description: The total transaction fees paid, denominated in Ether.

transaction_raw.description: The raw transaction data in hexadecimal format (optional field).

input_data.description: The input data sent with the transaction, typically used for contract interactions.

log_events.description: The list of log events emitted during the transaction.

explorer_url.description: A URL to view the transaction on a block explorer (e.g., Etherscan).

transaction_cost.description: The transaction cost in traditional currency (e.g., USD).

chain_id.description: The ID of the blockchain network (e.g., Ethereum mainnet is 1).
The ID of the blockchain network (e.g., Ethereum mainnet is 1).

block_height.description: Block number at the time of the snapshot

price.description: The current price of ETH in USD.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token in hexadecimal format.

token_type.description: The ERC standard of the Token (erc20 or erc777)

allowance.description: The allowance amount of the token, as a string. The amount is in the smallest unit of the token.

allowance_eth.description: The allowance amount of the token, as a string, denominated in ether

checked_at_block.description: The block number for which the allowance is requested.

checked_at_date.description: Timestamp for which the allowance is queried (ISO 8601 format).

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token in hexadecimal format.

token_type.description: The ERC standard of the Token (erc20 or erc777)

holder.description: The address of the token holder.

balance.description: The balance amount of the holder for the token in wei.

balance_eth.description: The balance amount of the holder for the token denominated in ether.

checked_at_block.description: The block number for which the balance is requested.

checked_at_date.description: Timestamp for which the balance is queried (ISO 8601 format).

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

event_type.description: The type of transaction (e.g., native_transfer, erc20_transfer, swap).

gas_required.description: The amount of gas required for the transaction.

fee_cost.description: The fee cost in traditional currency. This goes to the miner/proposer of the block for the network.

tip_cost.description: The tip cost in traditional currency. This is paid as priority fee to builders for faster transaction inclusions.

gas_cost.description: The cost for single compute unit (gas) in traditional currency.

execution_cost.description: The cost for the whole execution of the logic on the specified network in traditional currency.

total_cost.description: The total cost for execution in traditional currency.

address.description: The address of the contract that emitted the event.

topics.description: The topics of the log entry, typically an event signature and indexed parameters.

data.description: The data of the log entry, typically non-indexed event parameters.

block_height.description: The block number where this log was included.

block_hash.description: The block hash where this log was included.

log_index.description: The index position of this log in the block.

transaction_hash.description: The transaction hash of the transaction that emitted the event.

transaction_index.description: The index position of the event log within the transaction.

removed.description: Whether the event was removed due to a chain reorganization.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

count.description: The total number of logs returned.

logs.description: The logs returned by the query.

signed_at.description: The block signed time in ISO format.

signed_at_timestamp.description: The block signed timestamp (in seconds since epoch).

block_parent_hash.description: The hash of the parent block.

extra_data.description: The extra data attached to the block.

miner_address.description: The address of the miner who produced the block.

gas_used.description: The total amount of gas used in the block.

gas_limit.description: The gas limit of the block.

transaction_count.description: The number of transactions in the block.

transaction_hashes.description: The hashes of each transaction in the block.

transactions_link.description: The link to the transactions in the block.

block_valuation.description: The cost of the block gas in USD.

block_valuation_currency.description: The currency of the block valuation.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

block.description: The block information for the requested query

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

token_id.description: The token ID for the specific NFT.

token_uri.description: The URI of the token, which can be an HTTP or IPFS URL.

metadata.description: The metadata of the token, which can include images, attributes, and other data.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

is_owner.description: A boolean indicating whether the address owns the specified token.

owner.description: The owner address of the NFT.

token_id.description: The token ID for the specific NFT.

checked_at_block.description: The block number for which the allowance is requested.

checked_at_date.description: Timestamp for which the allowance is queried (ISO 8601 format).

chain_id.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

code.description: Bytecode of the contract deployed at the given address

value.description: The storage value at the specified key.

proof.description: An array of RLP-serialized MerkleTree-Nodes for the storage proof.

chain_id.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

address.description: The address associated with the account.

accountProof.description: An array of RLP-serialized MerkleTree-Nodes for the account proof.

balance.description: The current balance of the account in wei.

codeHash.description: A 32-byte hash of the code of the account.

storageHash.description: A 32-byte SHA3 hash of the storage root.

storageProof.description: An array of storage proofs for the requested keys.

decimals.description: The number of decimals of the token.

reserve.description: The reserve amount of the token in the pool.

reserve_eth.description: The reserve amount of the token (denominated in ETH) in the pool.

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

rate.description: The exchange rate between the tokens.

token0.description: Details of the first token in the pair.

token1.description: Details of the second token in the pair.

decimals.description: The number of decimals of the token.

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

rate.description: The exchange rate between the tokens.

fee.description: Fee tier of the pool (e.g., 500, 3000, 10000). corresponding to 0.05%, 0.3% adn 1%

fee_percentage.description: Fee tier of the pool (e.g., 500, 3000, 10000). corresponding to 0.05%, 0.3% adn 1%

liquidity_eth.description: The liquidity of the pool (denominated in ETH).

token0.description: Details of the first token in the pair.

token1.description: Details of the second token in the pair.

chain_id.description: The ID of the blockchain network (e.g., Ethereum mainnet is 1).

vault_address.description: The address of the ERC-4626 token vault.

total_assets.description: The total assets managed by the vault.

total_assets_eth.description: The total assets managed by the vault, denominated in ETH. (10^18)

total_shares.description: The total shares issued by the vault.

total_shares_eth.description: The total shares issued by the vault, denominated in ETH. (10^18)

exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate between shares and assets.

underlying_asset.description: The underlying asset of the vault.

is_valid.description: Indicates if the signature is valid.

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the blockchain network.

spender.description: The address of the spender allowed to spend the tokens.

value.description: The amount of tokens to be spent (in Wei).

nonce.description: The nonce of the owner at the time of signing.

deadline_timestamp.description: The deadline (as a Unix timestamp) for the permit.

deadline_date.description: The deadline (as a Date object) for the permit.

verifying_contract.description: The address of the contract to verify against.

chain_id.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

status.description: Whether the address is in the list (true/false).
